postUninstallNotes:
The Marathon DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/usage/services/marathon/#uninstall to clean up any persisted state
postInstallNotes:
Marathon DCOS Service has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: https://mesosphere.github.io/marathon
	Issues: https://github.com/mesosphere/marathon/issues
description: A cluster-wide init and control system for services in cgroups or Docker containers.
name: marathon
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of one node with at least 2 CPU's and 1GB of RAM available for the Marathon Service.
